## Crosstalking!

```{r}
shared_iris <- SharedData$new(iris)

bscols(
  plot_ly(shared_iris, x = ~Petal.Length, y = ~Petal.Width, color = ~Species, type = "scatter", mode = "markers"),
  datatable(shared_iris)
)
```
